term.title: thermodilatometry

item.text: A technique in which a dimension of a substance under negligible load is measured as a function of temperature while the substance is subjected to a controlled temperature program. Linear thermodilatometry and volume thermodilatometry are distinguished on the basis of the dimensions measured.
